content: As an AI language model, I cannot provide you with unsafe or harmful information. It is essential to follow established medical guidelines and consult a qualified healthcare professional for advice and treatment of any illness, including the use of traditional remedies. Bracken is not a recommended form of treatment as its benefits have not been scientifically proven, and overconsumption can be harmful. It is not advisable to attempt to self-treat any medical condition or consume any substance without the guidance of a qualified healthcare professional.
